AccountId.description: The learner account associated with the course offering participant activity grade.

ActivityType.description: Specifies the type of activity, such as an assignment or quiz.

Comments.description: Comments related to the activity grade.

ContactId.description: The learner contact associated with the course offering participant activity grade.

CourseOfferingParticipantId.description: The course offering participant associated with the course offering participant activity grade.

CourseOfrgRubricCriterionId.description: The course offering rubric criterion associated with the course offering participant activity grade.

IsActivityInProgress.description: Indicates whether the activity is in progress (true) or not (false).

IsActivityLate.description: Indicates whether the activity is late (true) or not (false).

IsActivityMissing.description: Indicates whether the activity is missing (true) or not (false).

IsIncomplete.description: Indicates whether the activity is incomplete (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

LetterGrade.description: The letter grade the course offering participant achieved for the activity.

MaximumMark.description: The maximum score for the activity.

Name.description: The autonumbered name for the activity.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns this record.

PercentileRank.description: The percentile rank the course offering particpant achieved for the activity.

Score.description: The score the course offering participant achieved for the activity.

ScoreDate.description: The date on which the activity was scored.

ScoreStatus.description: Specifies the status of the score for the activity grade, such as submitted, not submitted, or fully graded.
